faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions about TurboLearn? Find answers here.

items.title: How does TurboLearn's AI note generation work?
items.description: Simply upload your study materials, and our AI technology will analyze the content to generate concise, well-structured notes highlighting key concepts and relationships.

items.title: What types of diagrams can I create?
items.description: You can create various diagrams including concept maps, flowcharts, process diagrams, timelines, and relationship charts. Our AI understands different educational contexts.

items.title: What file formats are available for download?
items.description: TurboLearn provides notes in PDF, DOCX, and markdown formats, while diagrams are available in PNG, JPG, and SVG formats for both digital use and printing.

items.title: Can I customize the notes and diagrams?
items.description: Yes! You can fully customize formatting, colors, layout, and organization to match your learning style and preferences.

items.title: How many notes can I generate?
items.description: The number of generations depends on your subscription plan. Free users get 10 generations, while paid plans offer more or unlimited generations.

items.title: Can I modify notes after generation?
items.description: Yes! You can refine any generated notes by editing content, adding annotations, or requesting variations through our AI system.
